issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Expose originating fragment as a property of ScanTask
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11837](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11837). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is generally useful for debugging and tracing ScanTasks, and can be used to remove the [explicit mapping in FileSystemDataset::Write](https://github.com/michalursa/arrow/commit/ae396b9d4c26621cba2cce955f1d55f43e8faab9#diff-2caf4e9bd3f139e05e55dca80725d8a9c436f5ccf65c76a37cebfa6ee9b36a6aR278)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11837?focusedCommentId=17293803) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
This would implicitly introduce a guarantee that scan tasks keep their fragments alive
